column4: hi, I have a document I am working on in Openoffice.org in Ubuntu linux, and I clicked on the "Macro" tab in the "Picture" dialog box, and it pops up a warning telling me "OpenOffice.org requires a Java runtime environment (JRE) to perform this task. Please install a JRE and restart OpenOffice.org. Please install the openoffice.org-java-common package for this functionality.  When I close it, the dialog opens up again, I can't save a
try switching to another desktop, install the sun java from add/remove applications and then switch back to ooo
